TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit IteratorStateMachineAttribute extends System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StateMachineAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class IteratorStateMachineAttribute Inherits StateMachineAttribute

summary.span: 指示是否使用 修饰符标记 Visual Basic 中的方法。

span.span: Indicates whether a method in Visual Basic is marked with the modifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应应用`IteratorStateMachine`属性设为你的代码中的方法。You shouldn't apply the `IteratorStateMachine` attribute to methods in your code. 具有的方法在 Visual Basic 中的[迭代器](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/iterator.md)修饰符，编译器将应用`IteratorStateMachine`中它会发出 IL 属性。For methods in Visual Basic that have the [Iterator](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/iterator.md) modifier, the compiler will apply the `IteratorStateMachine` attribute in the IL that it emits. 当某个方法 (*MethodName*) 在 Visual Basic 中具有`Iterator`修饰符，则编译器可以发射包括状态机结构的 IL。When a method (*MethodName*) in Visual Basic has the `Iterator` modifier, the compiler emits IL that includes a state machine structure. 该结构包含方法中的代码。That structure contains the code in the method. IL 还包含存根 （stub） 方法 (*MethodName*) 调用到状态机。That IL also contains a stub method (*MethodName*) that calls into the state machine. 编译器将添加`IteratorStateMachine`属性设为存根 （stub） 方法，以便工具可以确定相应的状态机。The compiler adds the `IteratorStateMachine` attribute to the stub method so that tools can identify the corresponding state machine. 发出 IL 的详细信息可能会更改在将来的版本的编译器。Details of the emitted IL might change in future releases of the compilers. 迭代器方法通过对集合执行自定义迭代`Yield`(Visual Basic) 语句，以一次返回一个元素。An iterator method performs a custom iteration over a collection by using the `Yield` (Visual Basic) statement to return each element one at a time. 有关更多信息，请参见 [迭代器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f45331db-d595-46ec-9142-551d3d1eb1a7)。For more information, see [Iterators](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f45331db-d595-46ec-9142-551d3d1eb1a7). > [!NOTE] > 不能使用`IteratorStateMachineAttribute`要测试方法是否在 C# 中的迭代器方法。You can't use `IteratorStateMachineAttribute` to test whether a method is an iterator method in C#. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何确定方法是否是迭代器方法。The following example shows how to determine whether a method is an iterator method. 在示例中，`IsIteratorMethod`执行以下步骤：In the example, `IsIteratorMethod` performs the following steps: - 获取对象使用的方法名称。Obtains a object for the method name by using . - 获取通过使用属性的对象[GetType 运算符](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/gettype-operator.md)。Obtains a object for the attribute by using [GetType Operator](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/gettype-operator.md). - 通过使用来获取的方法和属性类型的属性对象`MethodInfo.GetCustomAttribute`。Obtains an attribute object for the method and attribute type by using `MethodInfo.GetCustomAttribute`. 如果`GetCustomAttribute`返回`Nothing`(Visual Basic 中)，该方法不包含该属性。If `GetCustomAttribute` returns `Nothing` (Visual Basic), the method doesn't contain the attribute. [!code-vb[Runtime.CompilerServices.AsyncStateMachineAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/runtime.compilerservices.asyncstatemachineattribute/vb/module2.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type stateMachineType) cil managed

param.name: stateMachineType
param.span: 用于实现状态机方法的基础状态机类型的类型对象。

span.span: The type object for the underlying state machine type that's used to implement a state machine method.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
